title: Borderlands 2 Standalone Update 4: Ult. Vault Hunter Upg. Pack 2
description:
This is Borderlands 2 standalone version '1.6.0 (113317 steam)' Update 4, up to date as of September 3, 2013.
Includes "Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2".

To minimize download time, this is a delta update from previous version.
To build it, you must have Borderlands 2 Standalone Update 3 version from http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8865045/

	Additional content and options available (all tested):
- Mechromancer Pack: Available when you choose a character class.
- Psycho Pack: Available when you choose a character class.
- Creature Slaughter Dome: Entry at the far east of "Wildlife Exploitation Preserve".
- Captain Scarlett and her Pirate's Booty: Fast Travel to "Oasis".
- Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage: Fast Travel to "Badass Crater of Badassitude".
- Sir Hammerlock's Big Game Hunt: Fast Travel to "Hunter's Grotto".
- Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep: Fast Travel to "Unassuming Docks".
- Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack: Finish the game in "True Vault Hunter Mode" and have your character reach level 50, new "Ultimate Vault Hunter Mode" will be available.
- Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2: Fast Travel to "The Raid on Digistruct Peak".
- All appearance customizations are available, including:
	- All 18 Madness, Supremacy and Domination packs (a.k.a. Costume Pack)
	- Assassin Stinging Blade Pack, Commando Haggard Hunter Pack, Gunzerker Dapper Gent Pack, Mechromancer Steampunk Slayer Pack, Psycho Domination Pack, Siren Glitter and Gore Pack (collectively known as Costume Pack 2)
	- Poker Night 2 customizations,
	- Diamond Loot Chest Edition customizations.
	- Community Day 2013 customizations
	- Costume Pack 3
	- Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 2 customizations
- From the Premiere Club Pack: characters get the Vault Hunter's Relic and Gearbox GunPack. Plus, you get 255 Golden Keys instead of a measly single one!
- From the Collector's Edition Pack: Contraband Sky Grenade.


	Other changes (all tested):
- When opening the loot chest in Sanctuary, you don't loose a Golden Key (but you still need one). Yeah, you can loot that golden chest as often as you want.
- Complete English, French, German, Italian and Spanish localizations are included.
- Standalone version: no Steam connection required.
